thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Fukong Interactive Entertainment says frozen of controlling shareholder and owner's shares by courts

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Fukong Interactive Entertainment says frozen of controlling shareholder and owner's shares by courts

organizations.name: shanghai fukong interactive entertainment co ltd

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Shanghai Fukong Interactive Entertainment Co Ltd :
* Says it controlling shareholder’s 157.9 million shares (27.42 percent)in the company, owner’s 31.8 million shares(5.53 percent) has been frozen by courts for three years
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/KAv6JG
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
